daveayan.gherkinsalad.components
Interface Selectable

All Superinterfaces:
BrowserElement, CanBeDisabled, CanBeEnabled, Nullable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DropDown, NullBrowserElement
public interface Selectable
extends BrowserElement

Interface that indicates that a browser element has multiple options from which one can be selected. This is an interface for the Dropdowns Unless absolutely needed do not make your page object implement this interface directly. Instead make them extend Dropdown.

Method Summary
 List<String> get_all_options()
          Use this method to get a list of all the option texts in the dropdown

should_have_options

void should_have_options(String... options)
Asserts that all the options provided as input exist in the dropdown. The dropdown may have more options which is ok but it has to have these.
